sentences.sContent: Even Enrico Fermi apparently did not bother to read Hasenöhrl's papers properly before concluding wrongly that the discrepant 3/4 prefactor was due to the electron self-energy identified by Abraham.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even Enrico Fermi apparently did not bother to read Hasenöhrl's papers properly before concluding wrongly that the discrepant 3/4 prefactor was due to the electron self-energy identified by Abraham.
sentences.sCn: 就连恩里科·费米显然也没有下功夫好好拜读哈泽内尔的著作，才会错误地将3／4前因数的误差归咎于亚伯拉罕的电子自能。

synos.tran: 有差异的；相差的；矛盾的

trans.tranCn: 有差异的；相差的；矛盾的
